root: ^(The door is locked. Just like Ava said.)
^(There isn't even a keyhole. It looks electonically operated, like sliding doors at a grocery store.)
^(Except, if, like, the sliding doors had broken sensors and were made of metal and super sturdy.)
^(How the hell are we supposed to get out of here?)
^(Ava mentioned us being kidnapped, but that still doesn't make a lot of sense to me)
^(I'm not some type of VIP or anything.)
^(I work remotely in marketing and play games all day. I only see sliding doors during grocery runs, which are also coincidentally the only times I touch grass.)
